title: 'Weak showers are for sad motels!' MAGA lawmaker declares war on weak water pressure
description: Rep. Russell Fry (R-SC) spoke out in Congress on Wednesday to demand change on what he sees as a pressing issue facing Americans: burdensome federal regulations on the water flow of showers."Nobody likes weak showerheads. Really, nobody likes weak showerheads…
